/* simple event ports */
#define receiveData_receiveThrottleData() SendDataPort_receiveThrottleData(&self->constData->receiveData)
#define receiveData_receiveSpeedData() SendDataPort_receiveSpeedData(&self->constData->receiveData)
#define receiveData_receiveInjectionData() SendDataPort_receiveInjectionData(&self->constData->receiveData)
#define receiveData_receiveIgnitionData() SendDataPort_receiveIgnitionData(&self->constData->receiveData)
#define receiveData_receiveABSData() SendDataPort_receiveABSData(&self->constData->receiveData)
#define ABSPort_sendThrottleData(data) SendDataConjPort_sendThrottleData(&self->constData->ABSPort, data)
#define ABSPort_sendSpeedData(data) SendDataConjPort_sendSpeedData(&self->constData->ABSPort, data)
#define ABSPort_sendInjectionData(data) SendDataConjPort_sendInjectionData(&self->constData->ABSPort, data)
#define ABSPort_sendIgnitionData(data) SendDataConjPort_sendIgnitionData(&self->constData->ABSPort, data)
#define ABSPort_sendWheelData(data) SendDataConjPort_sendWheelData(&self->constData->ABSPort, data)
#define ABSPort_sendABSData(data) SendDataConjPort_sendABSData(&self->constData->ABSPort, data)
#define ABSPort_recursive() SendDataConjPort_recursive(&self->constData->ABSPort)
